full_description: Oak Valley Homebuyers – Visalia, CA$60,000 – $125,000 a yearWho we are... Oak Valley Hombuyers is a local investment company that specializes in purchasing real estate throughout the state of California. Our mission is to transform distressed property and make an everlasting impact, one family at a time.ARE YOU A GO-GETTER LOOKING FOR A BIGGER LIFE? We are looking for people with die-hard enthusiasm, a flair for achievement, and a willingness to do what it takes to succeed. We are looking for the best of the best!! If you want to work in a high energy environment with excellent income potential, send us your resume. We look forward to hearing from you!Responsibilities and DutiesThis role is primarily in-office, working on day-to-day operations with the companies CEO.This role will be responsible for overseeing design & implementation of the following departments:Transaction Management:  Automate & Manage the companies transaction process from purchase too close.Operations:  Review metrics by and streamline reports by department.Finance:  Prepare & Report on the companies P&L by department & current projects.Sales:  Review metrics and create reports on the performance of our sales departments.
